scripts.migrate:dev: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate dev    --schema .work/prisma/schema
scripts.migrate:deploy: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate deploy --schema .work/prisma/schema
scripts.diff:from-db: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate diff --from-url "$POSTGRES_URL" --to-schema-datamodel .work/prisma/schema
scripts.diff:from-empty: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel .work/prisma/schema --script
scripts.db:pull: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma db pull --schema .work/prisma/schema
